crafting.name: Dynamite
crafting.description:
Simple throwable TNT!
Adds a new item which can be right clicked to spawn a dynamite which explodes on contact with anything.

crafting.name: Fried Egg
crafting.description: Simply toss an egg in the furnace to produce it! It will heal 2.5 hunger bars.

crafting.name: Binoculars
crafting.description:
A non-OP way to zoom! The amount of zoom is configurable.
Adds a new item which can be equipped in helmet slot and when equipped let's you zoom.

crafting.name: Slime Finder
crafting.description:
A way in-game to identify slime chunks by right clicking.
When right clicked indicates whether the current chunk player is in is a slime chunk.

crafting.name: Storage Blocks
crafting.description:
Storage blocks for flint, sugar, and charcoal. Charcoal blocks can be used like coal blocks.
Can be crafted in 3x3 with the corresponding item.

crafting.name: Bark Blocks
crafting.description: A block which has bark textures of logs in all sides.

crafting.name: Pedestal
crafting.description:
A new way to show your treasures to other!
Right click with a item to add & remove it to the pedestal.
Shift right click the pedestal to open its GUI.

crafting.name: Better stairs recipes
crafting.description: Changes the recipe's for all stair to be more consistent.

crafting.name: Better stone tools recipes
crafting.description: Changes the recipe's for all stone tools to use stone instead of cobblestone.

crafting.name: Better chests recipes
crafting.description: Adds a new recipe which allows chest to be crafted in bulk using logs.
